sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_980d92be1b5dc21018398485604bcb73
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="DELETE"><category>custom</category><client_script><![CDATA[function userReservationList($scope, $http, spUtil, $timeout, $interval, cabrillo, wsdUtils, wsdStateService, wsdReservationUtils, wsdRecurringReservationService, snAnalytics) {
// custom type definitions can be found at the bottom of the file.

	var c = this;

	// Used to determine if Cabrillo is executing in ServiceNow's native mobile apps.
	c.isNative = cabrillo.isNative();

	var TABLE_RSV = 'sn_wsd_rsv_reservation';
	var RSV_STATES = {
		draft: 'draft',
		confirmed: 'confirmed',
		cancelled: 'cancelled',
		awaitingConfirmation: 'awaiting_confirmation',
		inProgress: 'in_progress',
		conflicted: 'conflicted',
		awaitingApproval: 'awaiting_approval',
		rejected: 'rejected',
		create_failed: 'create_failed',
		update_failed: 'update_failed',
		orphan: 'orphan'
	};
	var RSV_CHECKIN_STATES = {
		awaitingCheckIn: 'awaiting_check_in',
		checkedIn: 'checked_in',
		checkedOut: 'checked_out'
	};
	var RSV_SUB_TYPES =  {
		occurrence: 'occurrence',
		exception: 'exception',
		recurringParent: 'recurring_parent',
		multiChild: 'multi_child',
		multiParent: 'multi_parent'
	};

	var RSV_RESERVED_FOR_TYPES = {
		everyone: 'everyone',
		me: 'for_me',
		others: 'by_me'
	}

	var CHECKIN_VALIDATION_INTERVAL_TIME = 10 * 1000; // in millis

	var tagIntervalPromise = null;

	// notificationConfig contains the properties: msg, type and icon
	// msg to display, alert type (success, info, warning, danger) and the icon to show
	c.notificationConfig = {};
	c.showNotification = false;

	c.$onInit = initialize;
	$scope.$on('$destroy', destroy);

	// view select2 options
	var viewOptions = [{
		id: 'upcoming',
		text: '${Upcoming}'
	}, {
		id: 'pending',
		text: '${Pending}'
	}, {
		id: 'past',
		text: '${Past}'
	}, {
		id: 'cancelled',
		text: '${Cancelled}'
	}, {
		id: 'all',
		text: '${All}'
	}];

	c.viewSelect2Options = {
		data: viewOptions,
		minimumResultsForSearch: 0,
		matcher: wsdUtils.trimInitSpaces
	};

	c.reservedForSelect2Options = {
		minimumResultsForSearch: 0,
		data: [
			{id: RSV_RESERVED_FOR_TYPES.everyone, text: '${All}'},
			{id: RSV_RESERVED_FOR_TYPES.me, text: '${Reserved for me}'},
			{id: RSV_RESERVED_FOR_TYPES.others, text: '${Reserved for others}'}
		],
		matcher: wsdUtils.trimInitSpaces
	}

	// contains all translatable messages, fetched from server script
	c.translations = {};

	/**
	 * Initializes the widget on client.
	 * Sets current page number, view type, select2Options.
	 * Makes functions available to html elements.
	 * Sets first batch of reservations to be displayed.
	 */
	function initialize() {
		c.translations = c.data.translations;
		var userServerSettingTimeZoneOffset = moment().utcOffset();
		var userClientTimeZoneOffset = new Date().getTimezoneOffset();
		if (userServerSettingTimeZoneOffset !== userClientTimeZoneOffset * -1)
			_showNotification('${Different local timezone detected.}', 'alert-warning', 'fa-exclamation-triangle');

		c.userData = c.data.userData;
		c.userTimeZone = wsdUtils.formatString(c.translations.userTimeZoneLabel, wsdUtils.getUserTimeZone() || '${No time zone found}');
		c.isCompactView = c.options.compact_view === 'true';
		c.currentPage = 0;
		c.viewType = 'upcoming';
		c.reservedForType = RSV_RESERVED_FOR_TYPES.everyone;

		c.getPage = getPage;
		c.handleSearchChange = handleSearchChange;
		c.openReservationDetailsHandler = openReservationDetailsHandler;
		c.formatTimeFromNow = wsdUtils.formatTimeFromNow;
		c.getCustomDateInFormat = wsdUtils.getCustomDateInFormat;

		c.hasMore = c.data.initialReservations.length > c.options.page_size;
		if (c.hasMore)
			c.data.initialReservations.pop();

		c.infoMsg = null;
		wsdStateService.setState('reservations', c.data.initialReservations);
		c.displayedUserReservations = parseReservationsForDisplay(c.data.initialReservations);
		c.groupedReservations = groupReservationsByKey(c.displayedUserReservations, 'startDateDependingOnTz');
		wsdStateService.setState('resolvedReservations', c.data.initialReservations);

		if (!wsdUtils.arrayHasElement(c.displayedUserReservations))
			c.infoMsg = '${No reservations available to display}';

		_createHandleCancelReservationWatcher();
		_createHandleUpdateReservationWatcher();
		_createHandleShareReservationWatcher();
		_showNotificationWatcher();

		if (c.data.userReservationsRecordWatcherEQ)
			spUtil.recordWatch($scope, TABLE_RSV, c.data.userReservationsRecordWatcherEQ, _handleReservationUpdated);

		tagIntervalPromise = $interval(regenerateTagsForReservation, CHECKIN_VALIDATION_INTERVAL_TIME);

		c.loading = false;
	}

	function handleSearchChange(){
		c.pageNumber = 0;
	}

	/**
	 * Gets a batch of reservations and adds if to the displayed user reservations.
	 * @param {number} pageNumber - The page number to get. Page 0 retrieves first batch, e.g. rows 1-4, page 1 returns second batch e.g. rows 5-8.
	 * @param {boolean} [usedSearch] - Indicates whether the method was called using the search.
	 * @param {boolean} [showMsg] - Indicates whether the notification needs to remain displayed.
	 */
	function getPage(pageNumber, usedSearch, showMsg) {
		c.loading = true;
		var startIndex = pageNumber * c.options.page_size;
		var endIndex = (startIndex + c.options.page_size) + 1;

		getUserReservations(startIndex, endIndex, c.viewType, c.searchCriteria, c.reservedForType).then(function(reservations) {
			c.hasMore = reservations.length > c.options.page_size;

			if (c.hasMore)
				reservations.pop();
			var reservationsParsedForDisplay = parseReservationsForDisplay(reservations);
			if (pageNumber === 0)
				c.displayedUserReservations = reservationsParsedForDisplay;
			else
				c.displayedUserReservations = c.displayedUserReservations.concat(reservationsParsedForDisplay);

			c.groupedReservations = groupReservationsByKey(c.displayedUserReservations, 'startDateDependingOnTz');
			var hasReservations = wsdUtils.arrayHasElement(c.displayedUserReservations);
			if (!hasReservations && !usedSearch && !c.searchCriteria) {
				c.infoMsg = '${No reservations available to display}';
				wsdUtils.voiceOver(c.infoMsg);
			} else if (!hasReservations && (usedSearch || c.searchCriteria)) {
				c.infoMsg = '${There is no available result for your search}';
				wsdUtils.voiceOver(c.infoMsg);
			} else if (c.infoMsg)
				c.infoMsg = null;

			if (c.showNotification && !showMsg)
				c.showNotification = false;

			c.currentPage = pageNumber;
			c.loading = false;
		}, function() {
			var errorMsg = '${Something went wrong whilst retrieving reservations please try again.}';
			_showNotification(errorMsg, 'alert-danger', 'fa-exclamation-triangle');
			c.loading = false;
		});
	}

	/**
	 * Attempts to retrieve user reservations from server.
	 * @param {number} [startIndex] - Start index of reservations to return. Also need to provide endIndex.
	 * @param {number} [endIndex] - End index of reservations to be returned. Also need to provide startIndex.
	 * @param {string} [viewType] - Determines if active or inactive reservations will be returned. Options: 'active' returns active, inactive returns inactive. If not provided both types get returned.
	 * @param {'for_me', 'by_me'} [reservedFor] - for whom the reservation should be defaults to "everyone" when empty
	 * @returns {Promise<ClientReservation[]>}
	 */
	function getUserReservations(startIndex, endIndex, viewType, searchCriteria, reservedFor){
		var encodedQuery = '';
		var orderByEndDesc = false;
		reservedFor = reservedFor ? reservedFor : 'everyone';

		switch(viewType){
			case 'upcoming':
				encodedQuery += 'stateINconflicted,rejected,draft,awaiting_approval,confirmed,in_progress,approved,awaiting_confirmation^active=true^reservation_subtype!=group_parent^';
				break;
			case 'pending':
				encodedQuery += 'stateINconflicted,rejected,create_failed,update_failed^reservation_subtype!=group_parent^';
				break;
			case 'past':
				orderByEndDesc = true;
				encodedQuery += 'stateINcompleted^reservation_subtype!=group_parent^ORDERBYDESCstart^';
				break;
			case 'cancelled':
				orderByEndDesc = true;
				encodedQuery += 'stateINcancelled,orphan^reservation_subtype!=group_parent^';
				break;
		}

		if (reservedFor === RSV_RESERVED_FOR_TYPES.me)
			encodedQuery += 'requested_forDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe'; // requested_for dynamic is me

		if (reservedFor === RSV_RESERVED_FOR_TYPES.others)
			encodedQuery += 'core_rsv_opened_byDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^requested_forNSAMEAScore_rsv_opened_by'; // opened_by dynamic is me and requested_for is not opened_by

		return $http.get('/api/sn_wsd_rsv/reservation/list',{
			params: {
				encodedQuery: encodedQuery,
				startIndex: startIndex,
				endIndex: endIndex,
				searchCriteria: searchCriteria,
				orderByEndDesc: orderByEndDesc
			}
		}).then(function(response) {
			return response.data.result.reservations;
		});
	}
	
	
	/**
	 * Gets the current reservation display timezone
	 * @param {Object[]} reservations
	 * returns {string}
	 */
	function getCurrentRsvDisplayTz(reservation){
		var currRsvDisplayTz;
		if(reservation.hasOwnProperty('building'))
			return reservation.building.timezone;
		else if (reservation.hasOwnProperty('location') && reservation.location.building)
			currRsvDisplayTz = reservation.location.building.timezone;
		else if (reservation.hasOwnProperty('locations') && reservation.locations[0] && reservation.locations[0].building)
			currRsvDisplayTz = reservation.locations[0].building.timezone;
		else
			currRsvDisplayTz = {
				value: wsdUtils.getUserTimeZone(),
				displayValue: wsdUtils.getUserTimeZone()
			}
		return currRsvDisplayTz;
	}

	/**
	 * Forms all the values displayed in the list. Done here so that we dont do constant rendering.
	 * @param {Object[]} reservations
	 */
	function parseReservationsForDisplay(reservations) {
		if (!wsdUtils.arrayHasElement(reservations))
			return [];

		return reservations.reduce(function(acc, reservation, index) {
			var currRsvDisplayTz = getCurrentRsvDisplayTz(reservation);			
			var reservationObj = {
				_raw: reservation,
				user: _formUserDisplay(reservation),
				label: wsdUtils.formatString('{0} - {1}', reservation.subject, reservation.number),
				number: reservation.number,
				reservation_subtype: reservation.reservation_subtype,
				building: reservation.building,
				startDate: wsdUtils.getDateInInternalFormat(reservation.start),
				endDate: wsdUtils.getDateInInternalFormat(reservation.end),
				startDateDependingOnTz: wsdUtils.getDateInInternalFormat(reservation.start, currRsvDisplayTz.value),
				endDateDependingOnTz: wsdUtils.getDateInInternalFormat(reservation.end, currRsvDisplayTz.value),
				date: wsdUtils.formatReservationDate(reservation.start, reservation.end, true, currRsvDisplayTz.value),
				currentRsvDisplayTimezone: currRsvDisplayTz,
				subject: reservation.subject,
				isPrivate: reservation.sensitivity.value == 'private'? true: false,
				icon: reservation.source_icon,
				// additional values that are used to check for rsv actions logic
				sys_id: reservation.sys_id,
				active: reservation.active,
				state: reservation.state,
				sync_state: reservation.sync_state,
				start_utc: reservation.start,
				end_utc: reservation.end,
				reservable_module: reservation.reservable_module,
				edit_restriction: reservation.edit_restriction,
				check_in_state: reservation.check_in_state,
				reservationAcl: reservation.reservationAcl,
				notification_custom_message: reservation.notification_custom_message,
				source_reservation: reservation.source_reservation,
				core_rsv_opened_by: reservation.core_rsv_opened_by,
				requested_for: reservation.requested_for,
				has_private_reservation : reservation.hasPrivateReservation
			};

			if(!moment(reservationObj.startDateDependingOnTz).isSame(reservationObj.endDateDependingOnTz))
				reservationObj.startEndLabel = wsdUtils.formatString('Ends, {0}',moment(reservationObj.endDateDependingOnTz).format('ddd, MMM DD, YYYY'));
			
			reservation = wsdRecurringReservationService.parseAutoResolveConfictState(reservation);
			
			if(reservation.auto_conflict_resolution_state && reservation.auto_conflict_resolution_state.value){
				reservationObj.autoConflictResolutionStateValue = reservation.auto_conflict_resolution_state.value;
				reservationObj.autoConflictResolutionStateDisplayValue = reservation.auto_conflict_resolution_state.display_value;
			}
			
			if (reservation.state.value === 'conflicted') {
				reservationObj.stateClass = 'state-conflicted';
				reservationObj.stateIcon = true;
			}

			// add the recurring pattern when it's a recurring reservation
			if (!_.isEmpty(reservation.recurring_pattern))
				reservationObj.recurringLabel = reservation.recurring_pattern.label;

			// construct reservable name accordingly based on single/multi reservation
			if (Object.hasOwnProperty.call(reservation, 'location')) {
				reservationObj.reservableDetails = wsdUtils.constructLocStr(reservation.location);
				reservationObj.reservableName = _constructReservableName(reservation.location);
				reservationObj.location = reservation.location;
			} else {
				reservationObj.reservableName = _constructReservableName(reservation.locations);
				reservationObj.locations = reservation.locations;
				reservationObj.reservableDetails = wsdUtils.constructLocStr(reservation.locations[0]);
			}

			_checkAndFormatMultiBuildingRsv(reservationObj);

			reservationObj.tags = generateReservationTagConfigs(reservationObj);

			acc.push(reservationObj);
			return acc;
		}, []);
	}

	/**
	 * Group a list of reservations based on provided key value
	 * @param {Object[]} reservations
	 * @param {string} key
	 * @return {Object.<string, Array>}
	 */
	function groupReservationsByKey(reservations, key) {
		if (!wsdUtils.arrayHasElement(reservations))
			return null;

		key = key || 'startDate';
		return _.groupBy(reservations, key);
	}

	/**
	 * Forms the display value for the user requested for or opened by for the reservation provided
	 * @param {object} reservation
	 */
	function _formUserDisplay(reservation) {
		if (reservation.requested_for.sys_id && reservation.requested_for.sys_id !== reservation.core_rsv_opened_by.sys_id) {
			var onBehalfOfStr = c.translations.onBehalfOf;
			return wsdUtils.formatString(onBehalfOfStr, reservation.requested_for.name);
		}
		return reservation.core_rsv_opened_by.name;
	}

	/**
	 * Construct the name for one or more reservables
	 * @param {Reservable|Reservable[]} reservables
	 * @return {string} - for example, Madrid or Madrid, Orlando, New York
	 * @private
	 */
	function _constructReservableName(reservables) {
		if (!wsdUtils.arrayHasElement(reservables))
			return reservables.name;

		return reservables.reduce(function(accumulator, reservable, index) {
			return index === 0 ? reservable.name : accumulator + ', ' + reservable.name;
		}, '');
	}

	/**
	 * Create watcher to handle rsv cancel response
	 * State is set in 'wsdReservationActions' directive
	 * @private
	 */
	function _createHandleCancelReservationWatcher() {
		wsdStateService.subscribe('handleCancelReservation', function(old, response) {
			if (response && (response.sys_id || wsdUtils.safeBool(response.success))) {
				var cancelMsg = '${Reservation is cancelled}';
				var rsvIndex = c.displayedUserReservations.findIndex(function(rsv) {
					return rsv.sys_id === response.sys_id;
				});

				if (rsvIndex !== -1) {
					c.displayedUserReservations[rsvIndex].icon.tooltip = cancelMsg;
					c.displayedUserReservations[rsvIndex].icon.classNames = 'fa fa-calendar-check-o';
				}

				_showNotification(cancelMsg);
				getPage(0, false, true);
			} else
				_showNotification(response.data.error.message, 'alert-danger', 'fa-exclamation-triangle');
		});
	}

	/**
	 * Create watcher to handle rsv update response
	 * State is set in 'wsdReservationActions' directive
	 * @private
	 */
	function _createHandleUpdateReservationWatcher() {
		wsdStateService.subscribe('handleUpdateReservation', function(old, newVal) {
			var response = newVal.response;
			var checkInAction = newVal.checkInAction;

			if (response && response.sys_id) {
				var rsvIndex = c.displayedUserReservations.findIndex(function(rsv) {
					return rsv.sys_id === response.sys_id;
				});

				if (rsvIndex === -1)
					return; // should never occur

				var updatedReservation = c.displayedUserReservations[rsvIndex];
				if (checkInAction === RSV_CHECKIN_STATES.checkedIn) {
					updatedReservation.state = {value: 'in_progress', display_value: '${In progress}'};
					updatedReservation.check_in_state = {value: 'checked_in', display_value: '${Checked in}'};
					updatedReservation.edit_restriction = {value: 'fully_restricted', display_value: '${Fully restricted}'};
					_showNotification('${You have successfully checked in}');
				} else if (checkInAction === RSV_CHECKIN_STATES.checkedOut) {
					updatedReservation.state = {value: 'completed', display_value: '${Completed}'};
					updatedReservation.check_in_state = {value: 'checked_out', display_value: '${Checked out}'};
					_showNotification('${You have successfully checked out}');
					getPage(0, false, true);
				}
			} else
				_showNotification(response.data.error.message, 'alert-danger', 'fa-exclamation-triangle');
		});
	}

	/**
	 * Create watcher to handle share reservation response
	 * @private
	 */
	function _createHandleShareReservationWatcher() {
		wsdStateService.subscribe('handleShareReservation', function(old, response) {
			if (response && (response.sys_id || wsdUtils.safeBool(response.success))) {
				var successMsg = '${An email notification will be sent.}';
				var rsvIndex = c.displayedUserReservations.findIndex(function(rsv) {
					return rsv.sys_id === response.sys_id;
				});

				if (rsvIndex === -1) {
					return; // should never occur
				}
				
				var sharedReservation = c.displayedUserReservations[rsvIndex];
				if(sharedReservation.state.value !== RSV_STATES.confirmed)
					successMsg = '${An email notification will be sent after the reservation is confirmed.}';
				
				_showNotification(successMsg);

			} else
				_showNotification(response.data.error.message, 'alert-danger', 'fa-exclamation-triangle');
		});
	}

	/**
	 * Creates watcher to handle showing a notification
	 * @private
	 */
	function _showNotificationWatcher() {
		wsdStateService.subscribe('showNotification', function(oldNotification, newNotification) {
			if (newNotification && newNotification.msg)
				_showNotification(newNotification.msg, newNotification.type, newNotification.icon);
		});
	}

	/**
	 * Handles the reservations that are updated by the record watcher
	 * @param {object} rsvUpdateEvent - Object provided as first argument to sp record watcher
	 */
	function _handleReservationUpdated(rsvUpdateEvent) {
		var rsvUpdate = rsvUpdateEvent.data;
		var reservationSysId = rsvUpdate.sys_id;
		var changedFields = rsvUpdate.changes;
		var updatedReservationObj = rsvUpdate.record;

		for (var i = 0; i < c.displayedUserReservations.length; i++) {
			var currentReservation = c.displayedUserReservations[i];
			if (currentReservation.sys_id !== reservationSysId)
				continue;

			// only change this after next digest cycle
			$timeout(function() {
				if ($scope.$$destroyed)
					return;

				if (changedFields.indexOf('state') >= 0)
					currentReservation.state = updatedReservationObj.state;

				if (changedFields.indexOf('check_in_state') >= 0)
					currentReservation.check_in_state = updatedReservationObj.check_in_state;

				if (changedFields.indexOf('edit_restriction') >= 0)
					currentReservation.edit_restriction = updatedReservationObj.edit_restriction;

				if (changedFields.indexOf('active') >= 0)
					currentReservation.active = wsdUtils.safeBool(updatedReservationObj.active.value);

				if (changedFields.indexOf('sync_state') >= 0)
					currentReservation.sync_state = updatedReservationObj.sync_state;

				currentReservation.tags = generateReservationTagConfigs(currentReservation);
			}, 300);
			return;
		}
	}

	/**
	 * Display a notification to the user containing information related to the state of the reservation
	 * @param {string} [msg] - message that should be displayed to the end user
	 * @param {string} [type] - type of notification that should be displayed (success, info, warning, danger)
	 * @param {string} [icon] - icon that should be displayed (e.g., fa-info-circle)
	 * @return {void}
	 */
	function _showNotification(msg, type, icon) {
		c.notificationConfig = { msg: msg, type: type, icon: icon };
		c.showNotification = true;
	}

	/**
	 * Handles opening a clicked reservation
	 * @param {object} reservation
	 */
	function openReservationDetailsHandler(reservation) {

		// Logs appsee event when user selects reservation to edit
		createAppseeEvent('Select reservation');

		var summaryPageId = c.options.reservation_summary_page_id;
		if (summaryPageId) {
			var reservationId = reservation._raw.sys_id;
			openReservationDetails(summaryPageId, reservationId);
		}
	}

	/**
	 * Opens the reservation selected, by redirecting to the reservation details page
	 * @param {string} pageId
	 * @param {string} reservationId
	 */
	function openReservationDetails(pageId, reservationId) {

		// logs appsee event while redirecting to reservation summary page from my reservation page by selecting reservation
		if(pageId === c.options.reservation_summary_page_id)
			createAppseeEvent('Reservation summary');

		var queryParams = { reservation_id: reservationId };
		wsdUtils.openPage(pageId, queryParams);
	}

	/**
	 * Regenerates Tags for reservation
	 */
	function regenerateTagsForReservation() {
		if (_.isEmpty(c.displayedUserReservations))
			return;

		c.displayedUserReservations.forEach(function(reservation) {
			reservation.tags = generateReservationTagConfigs(reservation);
		});
	}

	/**
	 * Checks if a reservation is part of group by validating that the subtype is single and it has a source reservation
	 * @param {object} reservation - The reservation to check.
	 * @returns {boolean} - True if reservation is part of group reservation.
	 */
	function isRsvPartOfGroupRsv(reservation) {
		var isSingleReservation = reservation.reservation_subtype.value === 'single';
		var hasParent = !!reservation.source_reservation;
		return isSingleReservation && hasParent;
	}

	/**
	 * Checks if a reservation is multibulding by validating that the subtype is multiparent and the reserved locations belong to differnet buildings and adds reservable details
	 * @param {object} reservation - The reservation to check.
	 * @returns {boolean} - True if reservation is multi building.
	 */
	function _checkAndFormatMultiBuildingRsv(reservation) {
		var isMultiParent = reservation.reservation_subtype.value === 'multi_parent'
		var isFromDiffBuilding = false;
		if(reservation.locations){
			var buildingIds = new Set(reservation.locations.map(function(location){
				return location.building.sys_id;
			}));
			isFromDiffBuilding = buildingIds.size > 1;
			if(isFromDiffBuilding)
				reservation.reservableDetails = wsdUtils.formatString('{0} +{1} {2}',reservation.building.display_value,buildingIds.size-1,'${more}');
		}

		return isMultiParent && isFromDiffBuilding;
	}

	/**
	 * Generates the reservation tags for a reservation
	 * @param {object} reservation - The reservation for which to get tags
	 * @returns {ReservationTagConfig[]} - The Tag configurations for the reservation
	 */
	function generateReservationTagConfigs(reservation) {
		var reservationTagConfigs = [];
		reservationTagConfigs.push(generateReservationStateTagConfig(reservation));

		if (reservation.requested_for.sys_id !== reservation.core_rsv_opened_by.sys_id)
			reservationTagConfigs.push(generateOnBehalfOfTag(reservation, c.userData.sys_id));

		if (isRsvPartOfGroupRsv(reservation))
			reservationTagConfigs.push(generatePartOfGroupTag());

		return reservationTagConfigs;
	}

	/**
	 * Returns the reservation state tag
	 * @param {object} reservation
	 * @returns {ReservationTagConfig}
	 */
	function generateReservationStateTagConfig(reservation) {
		var reservationSubtype = reservation.reservation_subtype && reservation.reservation_subtype.value;
		var isEligibleSubtype = reservationSubtype && [RSV_SUB_TYPES.recurringParent, RSV_SUB_TYPES.multiChild, RSV_SUB_TYPES.multiParent].indexOf(reservationSubtype) === -1;;

		var isEligable = reservation.active && isEligibleSubtype;
		var stateIsValid = reservation.state && reservation.state.value;
		var checkInStateIsValid = reservation.check_in_state && reservation.check_in_state.value;
		if (!isEligable
			|| !stateIsValid || !checkInStateIsValid
			|| !reservation.start_utc || !reservation.end_utc)
			return null;

		var tag;

		switch (reservation.state.value) {
			case RSV_STATES.confirmed:
				tag = generateConfirmedTag(reservation);
				break;
			case RSV_STATES.inProgress:
				tag = generateInProgressTag(reservation);
				break;
			case RSV_STATES.awaitingApproval:
			case RSV_STATES.conflicted:
			case RSV_STATES.rejected:
			case RSV_STATES.create_failed:
			case RSV_STATES.update_failed:
			case RSV_STATES.orphan:
				tag = {
					label: '${Action required}',
					icon: null,
					type: 'error'
				};
				break;
			default:
				break;
		}

		if (!tag || !tag.label)
			return null;

		return tag;
	}

	/**
	 * generates the confirmed tag
	 * @param {*} reservation
	 * @returns {ReservationTagConfig}
	 */
	function generateConfirmedTag(reservation) {
		var label = '';
		var icon = '';
		var type = 'info';

		var checkInState = reservation.check_in_state.value;
		var allowed_checkin_before = reservation.reservable_module.checkin_before_minutes || 30;
		var isEligibleForCheckIn = wsdReservationUtils.rsvIsEligibleForCheckIn(reservation, allowed_checkin_before);

		var labelArr = [];

		if (wsdUtils.isNowBetweenStartAndEnd(reservation.start_utc, reservation.end_utc)) {
			labelArr.push('${Starts now}');
			icon = 'fa-clock-o';
		}

		if (isEligibleForCheckIn)
			labelArr.push('${Ready to check in}');

		label = labelArr.join('. ');

		return {
			label: label,
			icon: icon,
			type: type
		}
	}

	/**
	 * Generates the In progress tag
	 * @param {*} reservation
	 * @returns {ReservationTagConfig}
	 */
	function generateInProgressTag(reservation) {
		var label = '';
		var icon = '';
		var type = 'info';

		var checkInState = reservation.check_in_state.value;
		var labelArr = [];
		if (wsdUtils.isNowBetweenStartAndEnd(reservation.start_utc, reservation.end_utc)) {
			labelArr.push('${In progress}');
			icon = 'fa-clock-o';
		}
		if (checkInState === RSV_CHECKIN_STATES.checkedIn)
			labelArr.push('${Ready to check out}')

		label = labelArr.join('. ');

		return {
			label: label,
			icon: icon,
			type: type
		}
	}

	/**
	 * Generates the part of group reservation tag
	 * @returns {ReservationTagConfig}
	 */
	function generatePartOfGroupTag() {
		return {
			label: '${Reservation is part of a group}',
			type: 'neutral'
		};
	}

	/**
	 * Generates multi-building reservation tag
	 * @returns {ReservationTagConfig}
	 */
	function generateMultiBuildingTag() {
		return {
			label: '${Multi-building}',
			type: 'neutral'
		}
	}

	/**
	 * Creates the on behalf of tag if applicable. Also doesnt create any tag if no translations are there.
	 * @param {*} reservation
	 * @returns {ReservationTagConfig|null}
	 */
	function generateOnBehalfOfTag(reservation, currentUserId) {
		var tagLabel = '';

		if (currentUserId !== reservation.requested_for.sys_id)
			tagLabel = wsdUtils.formatString(c.translations.reservedFor || 'Reserved for {0}', reservation.requested_for.name);
		else if (currentUserId !== reservation.core_rsv_opened_by.sys_id)
			tagLabel = wsdUtils.formatString(c.translations.reservedBy || 'Reserved by {0}', reservation.core_rsv_opened_by.name);

		if (!tagLabel)
			return null;

		return {
			label: tagLabel,
			type: 'neutral'
		};
	}

	/**
	 * on widget destroy, deregister all watchers, and clean out state values
	 */
	function destroy() {
		wsdStateService.reset();
		if (tagIntervalPromise)
			$interval.cancel(tagIntervalPromise);

		tagIntervalPromise = null;
	}

	/**
	 * Logs appsee event
	 * @param {String} eventName - Name of Appsee event.
	 * @param {Object} payloadData - Additional data for appsee event
	 */
	function createAppseeEvent(eventName, payloadData) {
		var payload = {};
		payload.name = eventName;
		if(payloadData)
			payload.data = payloadData;
		else
			payload.data = {};
		snAnalytics.addEvent(payload);
	}

	/**
	 * @typedef Reservable contains reservable information
	 * @property {string} sys_id
	 * @property {string} name
	 * @property {string} display_value
	 * @property {string} description
	 * @property {number} capacity
	 * @property {number} number_of_attendees
	 * @property {Reference} region
	 * @property {Reference} site
	 * @property {Reference} campus
	 * @property {Reference} building
	 * @property {Reference} floor
	 * @property {Reference} area
	 */

	/**
	 * @typedef Reference
	 * @property {string} sys_id
	 * @property {string} display_value
	 */

	/**
	 * @typedef ReservationTagConfig
	 * @property {string} label
	 * @property {string} [icon]
	 * @property {string} type
	 */
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>$title-color: $brand-primary;
$state-warning: $brand-danger;
$select2-color: #444 !default;
$background-gray: #bdc0c4 !default;

$wsdtag-info-backgroundcolor: $brand-warning;
$wsdtag-error-backgroundcolor: $critical-0;

/**
 * ONLY TO APPLY BACK ESC PORTAL STYLING

 */

	}
}

 */

.notification-wrapper {

}

		color: $link-hover-color;
	}
}

.view-options {

	.view-wrapper {

	}

	}

 	align-items: center;

.time-zone-label {

@media (min-width: 768px) {

	.reservation-body {

.view-options {
	// because element is wrapped inside a panel, it will force a different color
	.select2-choice {
		color: $select2-color !important;
	}
}

// CSS styling that will only be applied when Cabrillo is executing in ServiceNow's native mobile apps.
.wsd-mesp-wrapper {
	
	// Custom
	.my-reservations {
		padding: 0 !important;

		.info-msg {
			margin-top: 60px;
			margin-bottom: 10px;
		}

		.search-container {

				padding-top: 5px;
				padding-bottom: 5px;
			}
		}

	}

	.wsd-reservation-container {

			}

			.row > div:last-child {

	// ServiceNow component | Bootstrap
	.select2-container {
		a {
			margin-left: 0;
		}

		.select2-arrow {

			right: 10px !important;
		}

.wsdtag {
	display: inline-block;
	padding: 2px 6px;
	border-radius: 3px;

	margin-bottom: 4px;

}

	background-color: $wsdtag-info-backgroundcolor;
}

.wsdtag-error {
	background-color: $wsdtag-error-backgroundcolor;
}

.wsdtag-neutral {
	background-color: $wsdtag-neutral-backgroundcolor;
}

.reservation-row-with-wsdtag {
	margin-top: 2px;
}

.filter-label {
	white-space: nowrap;
}

.timezone{
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 400;
}

.resolve-state {
  color: $color-darkest;
  white-space: nowrap;
  display: inline;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: normal;
  padding-left: 0.5rem;
  padding-right: 0.5rem;
  border-radius: 3px;
}

.not-resolved {
	background-color: $state-danger-bg;
}

.resolved {
	background-color: $state-success-bg;
}

.resolving {
	background-color: $state-warning-bg;
}</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description>Widget to display a users reservations.</description><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>uniovi-wsd-reservations</id><internal>false</internal><link><![CDATA[function link(scope, element, attrs, controller) {
  
}]]></link><name>UniOvi WSD Reservations</name><option_schema>[{"hint":"Determines the batch size of reservations to load at a single time.","name":"page_size","section":"other","default_value":"12","label":"Page size","type":"integer"},{"hint":"PageId where widget needs to redirect user to after creating a reservation - if empty will stay on same page","name":"reservation_summary_page_id","section":"other","label":"Reservation summary page id","type":"string"},{"hint":"Shows the view drop down which allows filtering.","name":"show_view","section":"Behavior","default_value":"true","label":"Show View","type":"boolean"},{"hint":"This shows only the reservation name and reservation number in the list","name":"compact_view","section":"Presentation","default_value":"false","label":"Compact View","type":"boolean"}]</option_schema><public>false</public><roles>sn_wsd_core.workplace_user</roles><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	initialize();

	/**
	 * Initializes the widget server side.
	 * Gets initial batch of reservations and stores in in data object.
	 */
	function initialize(){
		options.page_size = _getDefaultPageSize();
		data.initialReservations = getInitialUserReservations(gs.getUserID(), (options.page_size + 1));
		data.translations = _getTranslations();
		data.userReservationsRecordWatcherEQ = _getUserReservationsRecordWatcherEQ();
		data.userData = {
			sys_id: gs.getUserID()
		};
	}

	/**
	 * Get the default page size from either widget options, system property or fall-back value
	 * @returns {number}
	 * @private
	 */
	function _getDefaultPageSize() {
		var pageSize = parseInt(options.page_size, 10);
		if (!isNaN(pageSize) && pageSize > 0)
			return pageSize;

		var reservationService = new WSDReservationService();
		var defaultPageSize = reservationService.getDefaultPageSize();

		return defaultPageSize;
	}

	/**
	 * Gets the initial batch of reservations to display in the list.
	 * Initial batch will always show active reservations as default view is "open".
	 * @param {string} userId - Sys Id of user who's reservations will be returned.
	 * @param {number} amountOfReservations - The amount of reservations that will be returned.
	 * @returns {ClientReservation[]}
	 */
	function getInitialUserReservations(userId,  amountOfReservations){
		var reservationService = new WSDReservationService();
		return reservationService.getUserReservations(userId, 'stateINconflicted,rejected,draft,awaiting_approval,confirmed,in_progress,approved,awaiting_confirmation^active=true^reservation_subtype!=group_parent', 0, amountOfReservations);
	}

	/**
	 * Get all the translatable messages
	 * @returns {Object.<string, string>}
	 * @private
	 */
	function _getTranslations() {
		return {
			userTimeZoneLabel: gs.getMessage('Times in {0}'),
			onBehalfOf: gs.getMessage('On behalf of {0}'),
			actionsLabel: gs.getMessage('Actions for {0}'),
			reservedFor: gs.getMessage('Reserved for {0}'),
			reservedBy: gs.getMessage('Reserved by {0}')
		};
	}

	/**
	 * Generates a encoded query to record watch all reservations the user can view
	 * @returns {string}
	 */
	function _getUserReservationsRecordWatcherEQ() {
		var userId = gs.getUserID();
		var userEQ = [
			'requested_for=' + userId,
			'core_rsv_opened_by=' + userId
		].join('^OR');

		return [
			'blocker_forISEMPTY',
			'reservation_subtype!=' + WSDConstants.RESERVATION_SUBTYPE.recurring_parent,
			'reservation_subtype!=' + WSDConstants.RESERVATION_SUBTYPE.multi_child,
			userEQ
		].join('^');
	}

})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>aaron.admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-05 08:15:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>980d92be1b5dc21018398485604bcb73</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UniOvi WSD Reservations</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Workplace Reservation Management" source="sn_wsd_rsv">e9b477e9c3161010cc7060bf4b40dded</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Workplace Reservation Management">e9b477e9c3161010cc7060bf4b40dded</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_980d92be1b5dc21018398485604bcb73</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>aaron.admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-05 08:16:01</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div ng-if="!c.isCompactView" class="full-view" ng-class="{'wsd-mesp-wrapper': c.isNative}">
	<div class="my-reservations padder-v-lg">
		<!-- Notification wrapper -->
		<div ng-class="{'notification-wrapper': c.showNotification}">
			<wsd-notification
				notification-config="c.notificationConfig"
				show-notification="c.showNotification">
			</wsd-notification>
		</div>
		<div class="panel panel-default esc-portal-border-override ">
			<!-- Header -->
			<div class="panel-heading panel-header">
				<h2 class="m-n m-b-xs">${My Reservations}</h2>
				<div class="hint-text">${Know when and where you'll be in office}</div>
				<div class="row m-t-lg">
					<div class="col-md-3 col-sm-4 col-xs-12 view-options">
						<div class="view-wrapper">
							<label class="filter-label field-label" for="reserved_for">${Reserved for}</label>
							<div class="control-view flex">
								<div id="reserved_for"
									 class="view-dropdown"
									 ng-model="c.reservedForType"
									 ng-change="c.getPage(0)"
									 select2
									 select2-options="c.reservedForSelect2Options"
									 aria-label="${Reserved for}">
								</div>
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="col-md-offset-4 col-md-2 col-sm-4 col-xs-12 view-options">
						<div class="view-wrapper" ng-if="c.options.show_view === 'true'">
							<label class="filter-label field-label" for="view">${View}</label>
							<div class="control-view flex">
								<div id="view"
									 class="view-dropdown"
									 ng-model="c.viewType"
									 ng-change="c.getPage(0)"
									 select2
									 select2-options="c.viewSelect2Options"
									 aria-label="${View}">
								</div>
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="col-md-3 col-sm-4 col-xs-12 view-options search-container">
						<label class="filter-label field-label hidden-xs"> <!-- spacer for search --></label>
						<form class="input-group search-form">
							<input type="text" class="form-control" ng-model="c.searchCriteria" id="search"
								ng-change="c.handleSearchChange()" placeholder="${Search my reservations}"
								aria-label="${Search my reservations}" role="textbox" aria-invalid="false">
							<span class="input-group-btn">
								<button name="search" class="btn btn-default" type="submit" ng-click="c.getPage(0, true)" aria-label="${Search}">
									<i class="fa fa-search"></i>
								</button>
							</span>
						</form>
					</div>
					<div ng-show="c.infoMsg" aria-live="polite" class="col-xs-12 info-msg">
						{{c.infoMsg}}
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<!-- Content -->
			<div class="panel-body padder-b-none" ng-if="c.displayedUserReservations.length > 0">
				<div class="wsd-reservation" ng-repeat="(date, reservations) in c.groupedReservations">
					<div class="panel panel-default">
						<div class="panel-heading">
							<h3 class="panel-title m-t-none m-b-none">{{c.getCustomDateInFormat(date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')}}</h3>
							<div class="time-zone-label">
								<span><i class="fa fa-clock-o" aria-hidden="true"></i> ${Times shown based on building location}</span>
							</div>
						</div>
						<div class="panel-body list-group reservation-body">
							<div class="list-group-item row wsd-reservation-container" ng-repeat="reservation in reservations">
								<wsd-tag
									ng-repeat="tag in reservation.tags"
									ng-if="tag.label"
									label="tag.label"
									icon="tag.icon"
									type="tag.type">
								</wsd-tag>
								<div class="row" ng-class="{'reservation-row-with-wsdtag': reservation.tag && reservation.tag.label}">
									<div class="label-value col-sm-2 col-xs-12">
										<div class="flex-row ">
											<div class="reservation-subject-wrapper">
												<div ng-click="c.openReservationDetailsHandler(reservation)"
													class="reservation-subject text-overflow-ellipsis"
													aria-label="{{::reservation.subject}}"
													title="{{::reservation.subject}}"
													tabindex="0" role="link">
													{{::reservation.subject}}
												</div>
												<small class="text-muted" ng-if="reservation.isPrivate">${Subject is private}</small>
											</div>
										</div>
									</div>
									<div class="label-value col-sm-2 col-xs-12">
										<div class="text-overflow-ellipsis">{{::reservation.reservableName}}</div>
										<small class="text-overflow-ellipsis show" title="{{::reservation.reservableDetails}}">{{::reservation.reservableDetails}}</small>
									</div>
									<div class="label-value col-sm-2 col-xs-12">
										<div>{{::reservation.date}}</div> 
										<div class="timezone"><span>{{::reservation.currentRsvDisplayTimezone.displayValue}}</span></div>
										<div ng-if="reservation.startEndLabel" class="timezone"><span>{{::reservation.startEndLabel}}</span></div>
										<small class="recurring-icon text-muted" ng-if="reservation.recurringLabel">
											<div class="inline text-capitalize" ng-if="reservation.reservation_subtype.value === 'exception'">(${Updated})</div>
											<div ng-class="{'recurring-line': reservation.reservation_subtype.value === 'exception'}"></div>
											<span class="fa fa-repeat text-muted" aria-label="${recurrence_capitalized}" role="img"></span>
											{{::reservation.recurringLabel}}
										</small>
									</div>
									<div class="label-value col-sm-2 col-xs-12">
											<div class="text-overflow-ellipsis">
											{{::reservation.requested_for.displayValue}}
											</div>
									</div> 
									<div class="label-value col-sm-2 col-xs-12 reservation-state" ng-class="reservation.stateClass">
										<span ng-if="reservation.stateIcon" class="fa fa-exclamation-circle"></span>
										<span>{{reservation.state.display_value}}</span>
                  	<div>
              				<div ng-if="reservation.autoConflictResolutionStateValue" 
                           ng-class="{'resolved': reservation.autoConflictResolutionStateValue === 'auto_resolved' || reservation.autoConflictResolutionStateValue === 'manual_resolved',
                                    'not-resolved': reservation.autoConflictResolutionStateValue === 'not_resolved',
                                    'resolving': reservation.autoConflictResolutionStateValue === 'in_progress'}" class="resolve-state">
                				{{reservation.autoConflictResolutionStateDisplayValue}}
              				</div>
            				</div>                    
									</div>
									<div class="label-value col-sm-2 col-xs-12 actions-wrapper dropdown">
										<wsd-reservation-actions
											ng-if="reservation"
											reservation="reservation"
											edit-page="'wsd_reservation'"
											is-native="c.isNative"
											translations="c.translations"
											checkin-before-minutes="reservation.reservable_module.checkin_before_minutes"
											template="'wsdReservationActionsReservationsTemplate'"
											show-private-info="reservation.has_private_reservation"                       
										/>
									</div>
								</div>
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<!-- Show more link -->
			<div class="col-sm-12 pull-none my-reservations-footer flex-row" ng-if="c.hasMore">
				<div class="text-a-c" ng-if="c.loading">
					<i class="fa fa-spinner fa-pulse fa-2x fa-fw"></i>
				</div>
				<a class="link-show-more"
					href="javascript:void(0)"
					ng-click="c.getPage(c.currentPage + 1)"
					ng-disabled="c.loading">
					${Show more}
				</a>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
<div ng-if="c.isCompactView" class="compact-view">
	<div class="panel panel-default">
		<div class="panel-heading">
			<h2 class="panel-title">${My Reservations}</h2>
		</div>
		<div class="panel-container list-group">
			<div class="list-group-item row wsd-reservation-container" ng-if="c.displayedUserReservations.length > 0">
				<div class="list-group-item row wsd-reservation margin-left-right-0" ng-repeat="reservation in c.displayedUserReservations">
					<div class="col-xs-12">
						<div class="flex-row wsd-icon-container">
							<div ng-if="reservation.icon" class="m-r-lg">
								<i class="fa" ng-class="reservation.icon" aria-label="${Reservation icon}" role="img"></i>
							</div>
							<div class="reservation-subject-wrapper">
								<div ng-click="c.openReservationDetailsHandler(reservation)"
									class="reservation-subject"
									aria-label="{{::reservation.label}}"
									tabindex="0">
									{{::reservation.subject}}
								</div>
								<small class="text-muted">{{::reservation.number}}</small>
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="row wsd-reservation-container" ng-if="c.displayedUserReservations.length == 0">
				<div class="panel-body">
					${You have no open reservations}
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="col-sm-12 pull-none my-reservations-footer" style="padding-top:15px" ng-if="c.hasMore">
				<div class="text-a-c" ng-if="c.loading">
					<i class="fa fa-spinner fa-pulse fa-2x fa-fw"></i>
				</div>
				<button class="btn btn-default btn-show-more" ng-click="c.getPage(c.currentPage + 1)" ng-disabled="c.loading">
				${Show more}
				</button>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>
